statements.sql:
insert into `snippets` (`title`, `description`, `instructionsId`, `vendorId`, `authorId`, `statusId`, `listPosition`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values ('Update the System Repositories', '
apt-get update
', 15, 2, 1, 1, 1, '2024-02-03 12:12:00', '2024-02-03 12:12:00')

insert into `snippets` (`title`, `description`, `instructionsId`, `vendorId`, `authorId`, `statusId`, `listPosition`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values ('Install apache2 Web Server', '
apt install apache2
\n
service apache2 status
', 15, 2, 1, 1, 1, '2024-02-03 12:12:00', '2024-02-03 12:12:00')

insert into `snippets` (`title`, `description`, `instructionsId`, `vendorId`, `authorId`, `statusId`, `listPosition`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values ('Create and Set Up a Database for Laravel', '
apt install mysql-server
\n
mysql_secure_installation
', 15, 2, 1, 1, 1, '2024-02-03 12:12:00', '2024-02-03 12:12:00')
bindings: Create and Set Up a Database for Laravel

statements.sql:
insert into `snippets` (`title`, `description`, `instructionsId`, `vendorId`, `authorId`, `statusId`, `listPosition`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values ('Step 4 – Install PHP With Essential Dependencies', '
apt install php libapache2-mod-php php-mbstring php-cli php-bcmath php-json php-xml php-zip php-pdo php-common php-tokenizer php-mysql\n
\n
php --version
', 15, 2, 1, 1, 1, '2024-02-03 12:12:00', '2024-02-03 12:12:00')
bindings: Step 4 – Install PHP With Essential Dependencies

statements.sql:
insert into `snippets` (`title`, `description`, `instructionsId`, `vendorId`, `authorId`, `statusId`, `listPosition`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values ('Step 5 – Install Composer', '
curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php

if Curl not isntalled

apt install curl
mv composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer
chmod +x /usr/local/bin/composer
composer --version
', 15, 2, 1, 1, 1, '2024-02-03 12:12:00', '2024-02-03 12:12:00')

insert into `snippets` (`title`, `description`, `instructionsId`, `vendorId`, `authorId`, `statusId`, `listPosition`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values ('install phpMyadmin', '
apt-get install php phpmyadmin

if there is connection error (Mainly in docker) In File /etc/phpmyadmin/config-db.php

change $dbserver='localhost'; to $dbserver='127.0.0.1';

restart apache service apache2 restart

check if phpmyadmin user is exist

SELECT * from mysql.user
CREATE USER 'phpmyadmin '@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'password';
', 15, 3, 1, 1, 1, '2024-02-03 12:12:00', '2024-02-03 12:12:00')

insert into `snippets` (`title`, `description`, `instructionsId`, `vendorId`, `authorId`, `statusId`, `listPosition`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values ('install NodeJs', '
cd ~
curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_18.x -o /tmp/nodesource_setup.sh
bash /tmp/nodesource_setup.sh
apt install nodejs
', 15, 2, 1, 1, 1, '2024-02-03 12:12:00', '2024-02-03 12:12:00')

insert into `snippets` (`title`, `description`, `instructionsId`, `vendorId`, `authorId`, `statusId`, `listPosition`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values ('Configure the App’s Virtual Host in Apache', '
cd /etc/apache2/sites-available
sudo cp 000-default.conf laravel.conf
sudo nano laravel.conf

<VirtualHost *:80>
    ServerAdmin admin@example.com
    ServerName laravel.example.com
    DocumentRoot /var/www/html/laravel-realworld-example-app/public/
     
    <Directory /var/www/html/laravel-realworld-example-app/public/>
            AllowOverride All
            Require all granted
    </Directory>
     
    ErrorLog ${APACHE_LOG_DIR}/error.log
    CustomLog ${APACHE_LOG_DIR}/access.log combined
</VirtualHost>
a2dissite 000-default.conf
a2enmod rewrite
a2ensite laravel.conf
service apache2 restart
', 15, 2, 1, 1, 1, '2024-02-03 12:12:00', '2024-02-03 12:12:00')
bindings: Configure the App’s Virtual Host in Apache

statements.sql:
insert into `snippets` (`title`, `description`, `instructionsId`, `vendorId`, `authorId`, `statusId`, `listPosition`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values ('laravel folder permissions', '
chmod -R 755 laravel-realworld-example-app\ncd laravel-realworld-example-app\nchmod -R 777 storage
', 15, 2, 1, 1, 1, '2024-02-03 12:12:00', '2024-02-03 12:12:00')

insert into `snippets` (`title`, `description`, `instructionsId`, `vendorId`, `authorId`, `statusId`, `listPosition`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values ('install laravel breeze', '
composer require laravel/breeze --dev
php artisan breeze:install
 
php artisan migrate
npm install
npm run dev
', 15, 2, 1, 1, 1, '2024-02-03 12:12:00', '2024-02-03 12:12:00')

    ]
    5 => array:4 [
      "title" => "install phpMyadmin"
      "description" => """
        <pre class="language-markup"><code>apt-get install php phpmyadmin</code></pre>\n
        <p>if there is connection error (Mainly in docker) In File <code>/etc/phpmyadmin/config-db.php</code></p>\n
        <p>change <code>$dbserver='localhost';</code> to <code>$dbserver='127.0.0.1';</code></p>\n
        <p>restart apache <code>service apache2 restart</code></p>\n
        <p>check if phpmyadmin user is exist<br><br></p>\n
        <pre class="language-markup"><code>SELECT * from mysql.user</code></pre>\n
        <pre class="language-markup"><code>CREATE USER 'phpmyadmin '@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'password';</code></pre>

    ]

        <pre class="language-markup"><code>bash /tmp/nodesource_setup.sh</code></pre>\n
        <pre class="language-markup"><code>apt install nodejs</code></pre>
        """
      "vendorId" => 2
      "statusId" => 1
    ]
    7 => array:4 [
      "title" => "Configure the App’s Virtual Host in Apache"
      "description" => """
        <pre class="language-markup"><code>cd /etc/apache2/sites-available</code></pre>\n
        <pre class="language-markup"><code>sudo cp 000-default.conf laravel.conf</code></pre>\n
        <pre class="language-markup"><code>sudo nano laravel.conf\n
        </code></pre>\n
        <pre class="language-markup"><code><VirtualHost *:80>\n
            ServerAdmin admin@example.com\n
            ServerName laravel.example.com\n
            DocumentRoot /var/www/html/laravel-realworld-example-app/public/\n
             \n
            <Directory /var/www/html/laravel-realworld-example-app/public/>\n

            </Directory>\n
             \n

        </VirtualHost></code></pre>\n
        <pre class="language-markup"><code>a2dissite 000-default.conf</code></pre>\n
        <pre class="language-markup"><code>a2enmod rewrite\n
        a2ensite laravel.conf\n
        service apache2 restart </code></pre>

    10 => array:4 [
      "title" => "eidt vite.config.js"
      "description" => """
        <pre class="language-javascript"><code>import { defineConfig } from 'vite';\n
        import laravel from 'laravel-vite-plugin';\n
        import vue from '@vitejs/plugin-vue'\n
        import fs from 'fs';\n
        \n
        \n
        //const host = 'dev.testtheweb.page';\n
        \n
        \n
        export default defineConfig({\n
            plugins: [\n
                laravel({\n
                    input: [\n
                        'resources/css/app.css',\n
                        'resources/js/app.js'\n
                    ],\n
                    refresh: true,\n
                }),\n
                vue({\n
                    template:{\n
                        base: null,\n
                        includeAbsolute: false\n
                    }\n
                })\n
            ],\n
            server: {\n
        //      host,\n
                hmr: {\n
                    clientPort: 5173,\n
                    host: 'localhost',\n
                    protocol: 'wss',\n
                },\n
            }\n
        });\n
        </code></pre>
        """

      "statusId" => 1
    ]
